website_summaries.verdict: A superior women's motorcycle jacket that is sleek, stylish, and comfortable.
pros: Vintage stand collar and front double layers closure with zipper give the jacket a one-of-a-kind appearance
Decorative rivets on the shoulders, waist, and cuffs add a hint of glamour
Faux leather exterior and 100% polyester lining deliver supreme comfort
cons: Shoulder pads are large and boxy

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it's perfect for the fall, I'm 215lbs, 5.5 and I ordered an 2xl, base on the previous reviews it was cut big, but my arms are big and my the problem with other jackets is that everything will fit except that it will be tight on my arms. This one is just good I fee I was able to ordered an 1xl, but just to be on the safe side I went up one size and the material is great. I loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking and feeling great!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is in point; I absolutely love the jacket and cannot wait to wear out; I'm glad that followed the suggestions from the review; I'm 5'8 1/2 and I weigh about 140; I purchased a size x-small; it does run small but I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Impeccably Made!!!!
customer_reviews.text: There is quality here!! It fits so good. Tailored look for a decent price. No funny smells. The lining is lovely to look at and feel. Sizing is on point, too. I'm about 210lbs, 5'5 and the XL fits perfect. Just the right sleeve length. You won't regret this buy! And it came 7 days earlier!!
customer_reviews.author: Niketa

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Adore It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket in September 2016 and I’ve been in love with it since! I’m a 16, 5’3 and I ordered a XXL that fits me like a glove ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Cherish Williams

customer_reviews.title: Pics to show just how bad the coat looked i bought this for my wife ...
customer_reviews.text: Pics to show just how bad the coat looked i bought this for my wife as a xmas gift...Disaster and Disappointed..Demanding a total refund!!
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today. im very impressed. i did not expect if to look and feel like real leather. i have a bunch of leather like jackets, none look like this. ive alsready gotten my friend to order one for his girlfriend. i read the reviews to decide what size to order. it couldnt fit better. Also has a really nice lining and you can zip the bottomw off if you want to wear it shorter. im 5'4 and 148 lbs, bust 36D and i got a size Medium. so i would say definitely runs small.But i love it, now i just need some chilly weather here in FL to wear it!
customer_reviews.author: Joei Skeffington

customer_reviews.title: Waaaay too big!
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is exactly as described. BUT NOT Sizewise! I used the size chart and it should have fit like a glove, instead it is 5 inches to big overall. I bought an XL. My size: bust 43, waist 34, hips 41. I thought I couldn’t go wrong as the product comes with free return. NOT! I tried to retun it but Amazon only pays $20 towards return shipping fees. It costs me $47 to return. And ofcourse I don’t get my $30 initial shipping fees back! I am very disappointed with Amazon. This is misleading advertisement!
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Do not go up a size
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I don't recommend going up a size as I had to return and purchase my normal size. That process was easy and item received on time. Material is great quality. I received many conpliments
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Everything!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket looks very expensive. I get stopped every time I wear it. It looks like McQueen. I luv this jacket. I wear a 14 and XL fits perfect. I am 5'10" tall. I would say 14/16 is XL. I am a 36D and the jacket closes with no problem. High quality jacket. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Happy MD Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I am not convinced that this is Faux leather, folks...
customer_reviews.text: Love at first wear! This jacket is far too beautiful to pass up. See video for details. I 4got to mention in the video that I bought an XL.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have a leather jacket that fits me PERFECTLY. My measurements are 42-32-42 and the size I ordered was XL. It is not too tight, it is not too loose. I would not be able to wear a thick hoodie under it, but I am okay with that. This is great quality for being faux leather and is thick enough to wear during the fall temps. I am in Michigan, so it gets pretty chilly here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome style once you remove the 80s shoulder pads
customer_reviews.text: Awesome style, sleeves a little short for tall people, and you HAVE to remove the ridiculous shoulder pads. Make a small 1 inch hole on seam inside by arm sholder, and you can reach both sides from there. Only hanging in by a thread so super easy to remove. I kinda hated the jacket with the pads in but now i love it once i got the pads out!!
customer_reviews.author: Stylishchica

customer_reviews.title: This jacket has no pockets
customer_reviews.text: This jacket looks and feels awesome but the biggest problem I have with it is that it has NO POCKETS! The pictures make it look like there are two zippered pockets on the front, but they are just decorative zippers. There's not even an interior pocket. This is the best-looking denim jacket I've found, but I'm torn on whether to keep it because of the lack of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Rhubarb

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT. Size down!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so in love with this jacket. Usually I’m a size M in everything, I’m 5’0, 130 pounds, 36C. I ordered a size S based off of what everyone said (runs large) and I’m so glad I ordered a size smaller! I wanted it to look fitted but not too tight to the point where I can’t layer it. This jacket is exactly that! Fitted, not too tight, and can wear a thin zip up hoodie jacket underneath. Love it! Looks so BA!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love the jacket. Looks just like the picture. Great quality material. I ordered the xxs and I'm a size zero, 100lbs and 5"5. And a 32 A. The length of the coat is just right. However it does run big. Even the xxs still fit loosely. If you want a super tapered look this won't work for someone the size listed above. There is a lot of bulk in the top part of the coat so if you are small chested, again you won't get a fitted look. All together it is a great product. Just order a size down from what you would normally need
customer_reviews.author: Rae E

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Best Amazon purchase I’ve made to date. I’m a size 12-14 and bought an xl. Perfect fit and very uniique cut and style
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Classic

customer_reviews.title: Listen ladies....
customer_reviews.text: Before I ordered this jacket, I read every single review for sizing... Because of so many mixed reviews, I ordered a XL and a 2XL because I'm literally an amazon woman (5'10/220lbs/40G)... listen to me when I tell you the jacket runs BIG!!! First one I tried on was the XL and its rooooommmieeeee!!!! Anyway, I LOVE THE JACKET! Super cute 😍
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It was clingy putting it on but molded and fits like a second skin
customer_reviews.text: Got xxs. I’m 5’ 116 lbs small busted. It was clingy putting it on but molded and fits like a second skin. The dual zippers really make the girls stand up. Best and sexiest jacket I own. I have a lot of jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: didn't fit and the shoulders are strange.
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to getting this jacket because it looks like one I saw at Nordstroms and was sorry I didn't pick it up, and then it was gone. I am 5'4 and around 120 lbs. It was huge. I might have ordered a smaller size but I didn't like the shoulders, It was too 1990's with those shoulder pads. the whole fit was just strange with shoulders like those the waist should have been much smaller, otherwise you look like a box. I returned it and got my refund in one day. I am sorry it didn't work out..
customer_reviews.author: ginahallg

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: A little big around my arms, but I have big breast. I got a 2xl.....fits great around the waist area. Waiting for my boots to match so I can rock.
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: Fake Leather But REAL style!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is baddass! I wear a 16 (1X or XL, based on their size chart) So I ordered a 2X and it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Naturale131

customer_reviews.title: Faux where!!??!!! It is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and all I could say is WOW!!! Faux leather where??? The quality is amazing...the jacket is heavy...had no smell ...it looked and felt like the real deal...it exceeds your moneys worth....no one would know it is faux unless you tell them...a very beautiful piece for sure...unfortunately mine was too small and I returned it...eveything went smoothly...with the return less than the 7 days for me....as soon as the money was refunded i ordered a size up...can't wait to have this again...loved it
customer_reviews.author: Treina pj

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is very stylish. It does run big, so keep that in mind when ordering. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Primadonna

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! I had to order 2 sizes larger than I normally wear in US to get right size. It is stunning piece. It appears to be well made. Very heavy - so not for warm climates unless you are cold-natured. I would order this jacket again!
customer_reviews.author: RBL FSH

customer_reviews.title: Bomb jacket forsure!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black one a while back and I loved it! Got lots of compliments! I ordered the green one a few weeks ago. It's definitely not the same green in the seller's pictures. It's more of an army green. I was a little disappointed about that but not enough to send it back. I still loved both of them. Im 5'3 and 162 lbs. I usually wear between a L or Xl in tops. I went with a L on both so it would be more fitted. Overall I am satisfied with both purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Neh

customer_reviews.title: The medium is PERFECT! (I am 5"6
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish jacket. U normally wear large, purchased it in large, it was a bit big, but not to where I needed to exchange it, but I did anyways for a medium to get a more sexy fitted look.The medium is PERFECT! (I am 5"6 ,178lbs, 12sz )
customer_reviews.author: Sacoyia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Cool Jacket. Returned due to size...
customer_reviews.text: Cool jacket but was surprisingly big on me and has an almost overwhelming amount of fabric. not sure if I would feel differently about a smaller size. I'm 5'6" 170 lbs, and 34C. Due to reading reviews where others said this jacket runs small, I decided to try the Large. I ended up returning this due to size. WAY too big in shoulders sleeves, and was just ill fitting. Thinking about ordering another size to try. Materials seemed to be of decent quality. Flattering and unique style. Bummed that this didn't work out on me.
customer_reviews.author: TBee

customer_reviews.title: Returning ASAP
customer_reviews.text: Jacket had scuff marks on the shoulder. Did not read anywhere that said it had chick padding sewn into the inside of the shoulders (wasn't removable) there for makes a small person look like they have linebacker shoulders. Would be great if you wanted to wear it for a thriller music video. I am a M, and it was quite large in body and the arms as well. Also smelled like dead rats. Returning first thing tomorrow, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty true to size for the most part. Nice fall jacket
customer_reviews.text: I like the thinner material and all the options with the zippers. I ordered a XXL and sized up due to reviews and wish I would've ordered xl instead. Debating on returning for a smaller size but it would be perfect if I wore a sweater or light hoodie underneath. Little big in the shoulders but the arm length is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: heather daniel

customer_reviews.title: More denim/1 size too big
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is well made and good quality.It's more of a denim color rather than a blue wash (pictured).It also fits about a size or 2 too small.I personally like a little breathing room for layering if need be, so going a full size smaller would work for that.If you're looking for a snug fit, go 2 sizes down.The pleaded collars flap around a bit.Good buy overall
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Barbie Doll

customer_reviews.title: Check for sizing
customer_reviews.text: The jacket was huge on me, I ordered a large, which I’ll be returned. I’m ordering a medium and small to see which size fit better. I’m fairly thick if I say so myself . For better reference for others to use as a comparison for themselves... my measurements: bust 38 waist 30 1/12 arms 12 1/2. I tried to post pictures to demonstrate the looseness but the second pics is not showing well. I’m actually pulling the jacket forward but it looks like I zipped it for a fitted look, not the case . 4 stars- it’s still a nice jacket w/ slight smell
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I purchased...
customer_reviews.text: I've been watching this jacket for over a year now. Scared to death thinking it wouldn't fit. Well.... guess what? IT FITS 😁😁 I weight 224 pounds, 5.5 in height. Authletic build. Broad shoulders with nice size arms 🙄. I purchased size xxl. The jacket is lined inside. The sleeves have plenty of room for women with big arms. Sleeves AREN'T slim fit! Double sturdy zippers. Fake pockets. That's my only complaint (I'm used to putting my hands in my coat pockets) I have plenty of room in the back and waist but NOT too baggy. Just right. Looks like real leather. Great quality. 👌🏾 I totally recommend this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Tylona Randolph

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a jacket like this since December and I decided this one was what I was looking for. I am 5'3 and very petite, and about a 32A cup, this jacket is an XXS. Drawbacks are obviously not having pockets and mine is a little loose in the waist but not terrible. The pros are faux leather so cruelty free, great sleeve length, the flare at the hip can be unzipped and removed for a shorter look, and I couldn't find anything on Amazon that beat it for style. Mine also came 3 days earlier than anticipated. So so excited!!
customer_reviews.author: carver333

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: The 4 stars are because 1) it has a weird fish-like smell and the sleeves feels wet when you have the jacket on. 2) the shoulders are padded (not terribly) but that’s not my thing. It fits perfect, I ordered a medium and I’m 5.5 and weight 169 LB.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: True to size..so measure yourself
customer_reviews.text: I brought a large because I read reviews first I'm 188lbs 5'2" and 36 C chest size hips 36-37 I love this jacket!💗🙅 no smell its soft and love the style. I'm a biker so I will be wearing it on a regular with clothes, biker gear and because I love it.. Its not an expensive jacket but it sure look like it. It fit me to the tee and show off my hour glass shape. I wanted no studs but now I'm glad I got this one. 2 thumbs up from me DC girl!! Hope my pics help.. It don't have a lot of stretch..so IJS...
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Washington

customer_reviews.title: Smells like an ash tray
customer_reviews.text: The jacket looks just as described and fit well albeit a little big at the waist. My problem is that it smelled like the ash tray of a 12 pack a day smoker. I've aired it out for hours and it still wreaks of cigarettes. I don't know if someone wore it to a bar and then returned it and then they sent it to me but that's exactly what it smells like. I'm going to air it out for 24 hours and if the smell doesn't dissipate I'm going to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: I loved this jacket. This jacket I initially thought had silver studs but its black. Its very stylish. It does have a weird smell. It isnt pleasant. But the fit is cute especially in the back it really shapes and curves to your body.. if you had to zippen the jacket up all the way it would take from the style of the leather jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Buuk01

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with fit
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure where the product is from, I don’t recall. But it must be China. They are very stingy with their material. I am NOT a large woman and I bought a large and it is tight in the arms. I guess I’ll wear it with nothing under it. Not satisfied with fit.
customer_reviews.author: tcapp

customer_reviews.title: To small and no communication
customer_reviews.text: Size is way off. Apparently very small Chinese sizes rather than U.S. I need to return this and can't get a response so i can get a larger size
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kooyman

customer_reviews.title: yassssss!
customer_reviews.text: I went up a size...I am usually in a large 5'7 210, but during the holidays I gained 10bs...b/c I added meat back into my diet after 20 years . but I am working it off now. I bought size XL its fits great!...its sexy and I plan to wear it on valentine's day when my future husband takes me to a concert...its sleek and hot! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: clova E Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest durability
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice jacket, dont care for how it lifts in the back the same way it does in the front personally, but is just my opinion on the style. I love the color and the zippers and double collar style! The only suoer downfall that took the quality way doen for me; the "studs" just seemed to fall off so easily. Like, i had my purse over my shoulder and some fell off! I even tested them by simply pulling a bit and they came off. So all good, but a dainty worn jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Hackney

customer_reviews.title: DANG GIRL
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is awesome! Looks like I spent way more money than I did on it like others have stated! I went by the size chart and was between sizes so I actually went with the M, down a size from the L I almost ordered and do not regret it! For reference I am 5'5" and 150 lbs. Literally the only downside to this is no pockets! Other than that everything about this jacket is awesome, not too hot when I go riding with my SO and stylish enough to throw on with almost any outfit. If they have the black back in stock in my size I'm also going to purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: Shaye Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Smells TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: The jacket looks just as described, fits great. It reeks of smoke - it smells horrible. I washed it twice in the sanitary cycle in my washer, 4 of the metal studs fell off, unfortunately the smell is still there. I febrezed it and hung it outside in the sun to dry all day, still smells terrible. I used my Amazon card points to get it, so I'll lose money if I return it. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Runs true to size for me, i do wish it was a tad longer but either way it's a very cute jacket. For the price though i do wish the zippers were a little more durable (haven't had issues, but they feel like they're on the cheaper end and will potentially end up getting stuck/ broken easily if that makes sense) it's thicker/ warmer than i thought, so that's a bonus for where i live. Sleeves fit perfect, very comfortable, the inner lining is satin- like so it feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

customer_reviews.title: Great shape for curvy gals
customer_reviews.text: I find myself wearing this jacket out all the time. I love the fact that you can remove the lower panels that bring the jacket down to the hips and just have something that hits at the waist. I also appreciate the double zipper on the front as it allows me to really show off my curves on one hand, but can also allow an extra inch or so if I'm wearing thicker clothes underneath. It goes great with jeans, dresses of all types, and is so very versatile! Had a little bit of an issue as the original shipment contained a different style than ordered, but the vendor promptly shipped the correct item.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Not as depicted.
customer_reviews.text: Not as described. Material is cheap, not denim. Not at all fitted. Waist same as hip. Length shorter than depicted too. Hassle-free returns though, to their credit...& Fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: ItchI LeMort

customer_reviews.title: I am in Love
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is the bomb. I recommend everyone to get them one. I am 4’11 and weigh 170 Lbs, not fat...Thick! I got this jacket in a Extra Large because it does run small and I need the jacket to not be tight in the chest area where it is making my chest flat. I am a Ddd by the way, so if you are busty please go a size up. This jacket is certainly a head turner.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: NOT LEATHER
customer_reviews.text: I will keep the jacket, but I'm not entirely satisfied with it. I thought it was leather, but it's not. It's made of denim fabric. The style is as pictured, just not leather!!!
customer_reviews.author: Delores F. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Such a great purchase! LOVE this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is BEAUTIFUL. I purchased it for a Halloween costume and I wear it a lot now. It is sooo cute. The fit is amazing. The quality for the price is BEYOND what I expected. So stoked on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ashleen

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this jacket. Fit is nice, quality is better than expected. Was hoping for the rose print lining, but it was solid black. They must have run out of the material during production. Overall, a pleasant experience buying from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Khani

customer_reviews.title: How to choose size based on fit style
customer_reviews.text: I got this jacket for my girlfriend who is about 5.2 5.3 about 119 lb and the small fit pretty good the arms were good and so were the shoulders but the chest and waist area were just a little looser then we wanted but not bad at all. Feels durable though so that was a nice and a breath of fresh air. If you are small and don’t have a big bust or chest and want a tight fit make sure you choose just one size smaller but if you are wanting to fit layers under this jacket then I would say go with your measured size. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Brandon carter

customer_reviews.title: Rocker Jacket that I wear everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. I’ve had it for two years and it still looks new. Everyone asks me where I got it. Only thing in is it does not have any pockets. I’ll stitch one in when I get a chance. It’s perfect for California weather. I tried the xxs exchanged it for the xs. I’m 5’8 140
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Such a flattering cut jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a nice faux leather jacket for months and I finally found this one that makes me have an hourglass shape. Other ones made me look like a box. I am 5’3” 112 lbs and bought the XS. It’s a little big, but it fits if I’m wearing multiple layers. I had to take away a star because none of the pockets are real- i have nowhere to put my ID and chapstick. Also I need to figure out a way to make the collar not flap over to the wrong side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the color of this jacket but was worried about how it would look on. There's always the uncertainty if what gets delivered is really going to look like what was ordered and how it will really fit. Not only does it look exactly as pictured, (I didn't order one of the cloth ones. I ordered a leather looking style and that's what came.) but it is heavier than expected and that is a bonus. Not sorry at all. It will make a great addition to my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Alexarra

customer_reviews.title: I pinned them down with some cool buttons and pins and it helped
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is really cute but the lapels are very big and floppy. I pinned them down with some cool buttons and pins and it helped.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 16 43/37/49 and this fits perfectly. It could even be maybe a 1/2 inch smaller but usually everything I order on Amazon is too small. I purchased the xxl darker green color and it's super cool. I wear it on motorcycles and feel protected and warm. Most importantly it's not too tight in the shoulders which I usually struggle with. I'd like to order more colors.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT. VERSATILE.
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy I finally found a good quality, cute, leather jacket for my busty self. I love how the bottom part of the jacket can actually zip OFF and turn into a shorter almost cropped jacket. I wear it more like that than the original way! My ONLY wish is that the cuffs of the wrists were just a little bit smaller. But it's still super cute. Such a versatile jacket that I still give it 5 stars. I personally cut off the little tags on the zippers. I like it better without all the dangly stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it fits the arms is a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it fits the arms is a little long but I can work with it Just what I was looking for... Thanks again Amazon You my favorite...
customer_reviews.author: DonnaD

customer_reviews.title: Fits larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XS which I feel fits more as a medium. The outside construction looks nice. The inside looks cheap. There are shoulder pads in this jacket that look like matting for quilt making. Not really a bad thing, but they could have used a darker fabric to cover it up. Mostly it just doesn't fit well at all for a smaller woman. It is made of a thicker denim which will make it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Order usual size. More Loose at chest than stomach
customer_reviews.text: I got a size too small for me. Im a large and i got a medium listening to reviews. Now my perfect jacket is up to my belly button (with the bottom zipper coming down to where it should be) so overall it looks like It fits well. I don't think I'll be able to breathe much 😂 but that's my own fault. The too half is surprisingly loose though so there's that. But let me tell y'all..... THIS JACKET IS STRAIGHT 🔥🔥🔥 it's gorgeous, sexy and feels high quality. It's heavy and feels so good. Beautiful jacket ! Definitely my fav piece of clothing now. I'll just try and lose some weight 🤔😂
customer_reviews.author: Kevin garcia

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, except for the armpits. I feel like it's going to tear open the seams there at some point. Maybe it will relax over time, we'll see. Otherwise I love it! I just try not to raise my arms higher than my shoulders, or reach too far for things.
customer_reviews.author: Avalene

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I ordered this jacket! I was worried since it's faux leather and quality can be hit or miss, but it is really good quality! It's super thick and heavy, not thin and cheap. It does fit a little bigger than I expected, I usually wear a Large in jackets (my arms are on the thick side :-)) so that's what I ordered and I had plenty of room. Especially if I plan to wear another shirt underneath. Happy I made this purchase, can't believe I got it for under $75.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: I liked it at first but after taking it with my ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first but after taking it with my travelling the zipper broke! I'm really frustrated that a jacket that coast nearly $70 has such a low quality zipper on it. Also, the other photos showed a nice floral lining, but the lining inside my jacket came with black and white off brand nike checks...
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Get ready for the compliments!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is phenomenal. The material feels great. The fit is so flattering. It hugs my waistline and accentuates my hips perfectly. Even the lining is gorgeous. Very sexy. I receive compliments on it everywhere I go. Shipping was a breeze. I needed it quickly, chose express shipping, and it was here within the week.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Cooke

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS JACKET!
customer_reviews.text: While I love this jacket it is NOT a faux leather look in the denim gray--- nor is it gray at all. Its a dark blue heavy denim--and looks it. It is lined and feels good on and looks AMAZING!! My only complaint is that it came horribly wrinkled, and while the jacket feels like pretty good quality the zippers being wrinkly makes it look not so great (tho still cool) and difficult to operate. I am hoping I can iron them out, I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very well made jacket. Was quite suprised at quality. Nice material and good weigh. Have to exchange for medium. I want. It to be fitted. Im 5ft9in. 146lbs. Wear 6/8 clothing.Usually mediums jackets are to short and tight!! Really hope medium fits. I love the edgy style.
customer_reviews.author: m b

customer_reviews.title: Really great jacket my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I expected lower quality thinner fabric but this stuff is really nice. My wife loves this thing and I think it looks great too. Keep in mind that this thing runs large. So you may want to go with a smaller size if you want it snug. The only think I think is a little weird is one of the cosmetic zippers is actually one side of a zipper. It is cosmetic so this is not a problem just a little weird.
customer_reviews.author: Albatross Necklace

customer_reviews.title: Fish Smell Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the green in small. It runs big and I decided I didn't like the green, so ordered a XX Small in black. It smells like they over treated it with chemicals and actually has a fishy smell. I exchanged it for another since I read many did not have the smell, but sure enough the replacement still smells! Such a disappointment for such a rad jacket. But who wants to smell like a fish market?
customer_reviews.author: Malery Williams

customer_reviews.title: Ooohhhhh if you want to wear your sass pants.. you need this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I HAD to cut out the shoulder pads though! I’m not into that! Wish the’d offer it with or w/o them!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Life

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Jacket, Great Quality, Fit Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a birthday present. I was SHOCKED at how great the quality was. It fit BEAUTIFULLY! It looks amazing on and it fit as expected. Great craftsmanship! She constantly gets compliments on this jacket. I have given the link for this specific jacket to MULTIPLE people! They also have multiple colors to be able to purchase it in! I HIGHLY recommend this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but disappointing cut
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to what others may be saying, this jacket runs large. I am pretty curvy and usually take a size large in tops due to my triple-D bust. I ordered a large in this jacket and it was loose in the breast area and completely tented at my waist -- not at all the desired effect. I absolutely love this style but I'm disappointed in the cut. I will probably just look for another form-fitting jacket and hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stegeman

customer_reviews.title: Thick denim not a light jacket
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This jacket was on point. This is not a light jacket; it is thick denim material and not cheep looking at all. I wear size 14-16 and ordered a size large and it fit perfect. I can zip it up just fine. I ordered the gray denim which would look great with black or light denim jeans. Th hardware is riveted onto the jacket not glued on. Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 💔🙁 Wider (fatter) now
customer_reviews.text: I was re-purchasing this jacket because I loved it so much but, but this new one is too big!! They are both size “extra small” but this one is a lot wider and a LOT larger in the waist. Perhaps they were trying to accommodate people who claimed it “runs small” but I have both jackets and this new one is a lot wider! When you lay them side by side the difference is remarkable
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: True to Size
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews that gave weight and size and stated the jacket ran small. That wasn't my experience. I'm a 34 DD, 138 pounds, 5"4" Based on reviews I read I got an Xsmall - it was too small, then got medium. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Viki Ryan

customer_reviews.title: For fashion only. No function.
customer_reviews.text: It feels nice, but the overall product is very thin and there are no pockets inside nor out. To mimic a motorcycle riding jacket and have not one pocket is very odd to me. Every jacket I have owned, even cheaper ones had at least internal pockets. It looks nice and fits well, but that's where the positives really end. If you want looks with none of the function, this is a decent choice. The zippers on the side and cuff serve absolutely no purpose aside from looks.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Jacket but Zippers DO NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this Jacket it has a great shape and looks real. The shipping was very fast and I am so excited to wear it BUT the zippers do not work. I will keep it but I am extremely upset that I can not zip it up if I wanted too. I ordered a larger and I am 5ft 4 and 170lbs and it fit snug on my arms but other than that great Jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Sexy warm!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small and extra small. I’m 5’4”, 130, 37-27-37. The small was too large in the waist. I’m returning the small. Extra small fit well, even though I’m a 34DDD. Pretty warm jacket too btw.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful 80s style leather jacket
customer_reviews.text: Lovely jacket. Feels AMAZING. Polished, light weight leather. Excellent quality. Looks exactly like picture. Only thing. I don't understand the collar/chest. It doesn't look nice when zipped up. Doesn't lay against the chest like it seems it should. Also, NO POCKETS! Who told them we don't want pockets on our jacket?? Jacket also has shoulder pads which gives it an 80s MJ look.
customer_reviews.author: beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, but not for tall people.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and looks as pictured. Wanted this jacket to fit so so so badly. But I'm too tall for this. The lowest point of the jacket barely hit the bottom of my back, above my butt. I'm 5'10. True to size and a great purchase if you aren't tall. Customer service was great and I recieved my refund within minutes of taking it to our local Kohls for return. Just wish this company made clothing in talls.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Ok I’m 5’4 measurements are 36- 30-47 the jacket size is a medium it fit perfect around my arms and chest very loose around my waist the lower part zips off which made it easier with my outfit it worth the money it’s fun super great and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does look like leather
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised that it did look like leather as other reviews have said. It good looking “pleather”. It does run small in my opinion. Glad I ordered bigger because my real size in jackets (XL) never would have fit. This would look super super cute on small framed women, but think it’s good on a larger frame too. Good stylish jacket without the price of real leather. Was surprised and like it.
customer_reviews.author: HER

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Cute! but shoulder pads were thicker than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the jacket. It's good quality. The padding in the shoulders were more like little pillows. They were pretty thick but I figure if I ordered a smaller size it might not look as big in the shoulders. I typically am a size 14/Large but ordered an XL because I have bigger arms, just in case but after I received it, I realize I could have ordered a large... which would probably also make it look a little better as well in reference to the shoulder pads. I also figure there is a way that I could probably take out the pads somehow also.
customer_reviews.author: Krista morris

customer_reviews.title: Green Dream
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little beauty for my daughter and from the moment she opened the packaged she was in love. I purchased a large and she is a 10-12 with muscular arms, but it fit well, without issues. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Especially for the money! Fits well and I have gotten several compliments on it. I got a large and it’s a tiny bit big in the shoulders but I’m glad I did otherwise it would’ve been too short both in the length of the jacket and the sleeves so it fits just right and I’m 5’7 137
customer_reviews.author: LooLoo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jackets!! I got 2 in different sizes and colors.
customer_reviews.text: I love the is jackets!! I bought 2 of them. The first one (green) I ordered size small but fit a little lose on the waistline. I love the color and I didn’t return it cause it can be worn unzipped and looks good , but I ordered an x small(dark red , looks burgundy) in another color and this one fits much tighter, but don’t think I can wear it with anything thick under it . I’m 5’3 and 126 pounds ( 34D). Overall I’m very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Not the style I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute jacket but not the one I ordered. I ordered a dark denim gray and, based on the pictures, black rhinestones and black zippers. I received a darker denim...but with silver goldish rhinestones and silver goldish zippers. Very sad this is not what I was expecting because the jacket is adorable. Did not receive what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jeska

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and true to fit!
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate, just do it! This fake leather jacket is made of good quality. No crazy noise coming from it as you strut your stuff looking so cute in your new jacket. I was pleasantly surprised to realize the bottom zipper is detachable to make it a shorter length of desired! My only complaints about this are: It has shoulder pads, not a preference of mine but they're probably easy to remove. There are NO pockets 😪
customer_reviews.author: Berniee

customer_reviews.title: They need to make more like this. Amazing jacket. Well done
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here. I’m 5’6 and 190 Ibs I got an xl and it’s absolutely a must have. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Love kindle! a-z shopper

customer_reviews.title: "BLUE COAT HAS A TOTALLY INACCURATE DESCRIPTION OF COLOR AND MATERIAL!"
customer_reviews.text: The blue one absolutely colored "NOTHING" like the photo! The description says faux leather. That is totally wrong. The jacket is made of the same material and color of well washed blue jeans. A few areas of it had been lightly bleached out. Not at all in the same ballpark of the cool looking color being shown.
customer_reviews.author: PARATECH1

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the style I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying this jacket at first. I've never had much luck buying clothes online. I actually bought this for an inspired Halloween costume- though it fits so well that I'm sure I'll wear it to all sorts of occasions. The look is spot on, and it fits really well. My upper arms are a little tight, but only enought to be noticeable to me, not uncomfortable though. Which I kind of expected given my normal clothing issues. 100% would recommend to anybody looking for a particular look for Halloween or even just some casual wear. It does both very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really happy I read the reviews and its not Faux leather, it is canvas type
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL, 16-18 because I wanted some room to move. This fits great, is not leather, is canvas and is an army type green not lime green as the photo shows. Its not too young looking on me and I am 5'4'' and 152lbs. I am so glad to have a summer jacket for cool evenings. It arrived fast and yes I just got it, but all the zippers work, we will see how long it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: R2K Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Eeeee, okay
customer_reviews.text: 36", 32",42", 155lbs, someone bought me a Large as a gift; length was good, it fit in the waist but was too large for chest. Ordered a medium and it fit better in the chest but was too tight on arms/shoulders
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Epic disappointment. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: On top of this being a horrible, poorly made, poor quality product that is completely different from the description and is much larger than indicated by the size chart, I returned it 4 months ago and still have not received a refund. Never use Kohl's return center and don't waste your money on this piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: PaperOrchid

customer_reviews.title: waist fit loose arms are short
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this jacket for a while finally order. Pro: It is cute and the leather feels butter soft. Con: arms length is a bit short and the waist area is loose I would have like it a little more shapely and fitted. Flaps on chest in pic do not stay laid as in pic they fall down and lay on your chest which gives jacket an entirely different look .
customer_reviews.author: starr2

customer_reviews.title: Sizing stats in review
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7, 205 #, 38 DD, 14/16 in old navy skinny jeans. My upper arms are not thin. I ordered an XL . It fits as expected. I can't wear a sweater with it, but anything tshirt material will work. It doesn't have a weird smell. My only complaint is the studs are not applied in a uniform fashion. It kinda looks like a drunk applied them. Not bad enough for me to return though.
customer_reviews.author: blabbidybla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fall!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised, perfect fit. I'm 40/38/46 and it fits like a glove. Love the details in the jacket. Will make any tshirt stand out. Highly recommended. Just fyi, no pockets at all, zippers on side just for decore. Inside nicely lined in black.
customer_reviews.author: Vierna Darguth

customer_reviews.title: way too big
customer_reviews.text: I bought an XS of the same jacket in denim by a different vendor. It fit fine. This XS is very big, I'd say 2 sizes too big. I thought it came from the same manufacturer, since it is absolutely identical in style, and it may indeed, with this vendor perhaps just using a different sizing method for the US market. So, if you a real XS, don't waste your time, this is about a M.
customer_reviews.author: el prado

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: But I️ ordered an xsmall and I️ actually need the XX small! It shouldn’t fit this way thought considering a small should fit and the xsmall just give me the tailored look I️ like around my waist. But I️ will return this one for the xxs so it can’t fit my waist better. Also the arms are too short.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Nice but fit me weirdly
customer_reviews.text: Sadly returning this pretty jacket. Can't handle the shoulder pads! They are big and thick and I already have nice square shoulders, felt really bulky, fake, and weird. This will be fantastic on other ladies but is just not for my body type. When zipped it was all floppy in the chest area but fit nicely everywhere else. Those of you with big bazooms will love the way it fits! I am a smallish average sized lady, wear sm or med like about a 5 to an 8 in most clothes and I ordered the small in grey denim. Loved the look of the grey denim btw.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Well made/Size down
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket, and am planning to reorder in the winter months. However size down! I purchased an XL because I have a large chest. ~44 in and I like room to hav sweaters under my jackets, but this was huge. I expected the waist to be large but the entire thing was a bit bigger. I could even use the secondary zipper to close the jacket with room. So size Down and enjoy this well made jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Channing

product_meta.title: chouyatou Women's Fashion Studded Perfectly Shaping Faux Leather Biker Jacket
feature_bullets: Fabric: high quality pu leather; Lining: 100% Polyester
Vintage stand collar, front double layers closure with zipper
Decorative rivets on shoulder, waist and cuff, removable side bottoms
Long sleeve with zip slits, washed faux pu leather fabric, suitable for various occasions
Made in China and Shipped from China, free shipping need 7-14 days arrived
